text: Ojo on [Parvardigore], ki hokim ʙar har kas va [nozir ʙar] raftoru kirdori ust, [ʙa parastis sazovortar ast jo ʙuthoi ʙecon]? Va [kofiron] ʙaroi Alloh taolo sarikone qaror dodaand. Bigu: «Ononro nom ʙared». Ojo [mexohed ʙa] u dar ʙorai on ci dar zamin ast va u namedonad xaʙar dihed, jo faqat suxani sathie va [ʙeasos] megued? [Cunin nest] ʙalki ʙaroi kasone, ki kufr varzidaand, najrangason orosta sudaast va az rohi [haq] ʙozdosta sudaand va har kiro Alloh taolo gumroh guzorad, hidojatgare naxohad dost
